alert.note: Alert for Merrimack; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:46PM EDT until July 12 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR SULLIVAN...SOUTHWESTERN GRAFTON AND WESTERN MERRIMACK COUNTIES... At 345 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Piermont to near Charlestown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Claremont, Lebanon, Henniker, New London, Plymouth, Grafton, Hanover, Charlestown, Enfield, Canaan, Holderness, Ashland, Bradford, Danbury, Groton, Newport, Warner, Marlow, Piermont and Alstead. This includes the following highways... Interstate 89 between mile markers 19 and 60. Interstate 93 between mile markers 78 and 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
